data.title: Here Are All the Winners From the 2020 Oscars
data.meta_description: A complete list of winners from the 92nd Academy Awards.
data.text:
It’s time for the 92nd Academy Awards.

The winners at the ceremony included Elton John and Bernie Taupin, who took home best original song for Rocketman. Hildur Guðnadóttir won best original score for her work on Joker. For playing Judy Garland in Judy, Renee Zellweger became a two-time Oscar winner. And Parasite‘s Bong Joon earned best original screenplay and best director and the film won best picture.

See the full list below:

Best Picture

Ford V Ferrari

The Irishman

Jojo Rabbit

Joker

Little Women
